fields.name: favicon
fields.label: Favicon
fields.description: The favicon is the small icon that appears on the browser tab. It is usually the logo, or a simplified version of the logo.

fields.label: Menu Links
fields.name: navLinks
fields.description: If you delete a page that is linked in this menu, you must also delete or update the menu link here!

fields.name: linkType
fields.label: Destination
fields.description: Is this link internal (goes to a page on your website) or external (goes to a different website)?

fields.name: background
fields.label: Choose a background color or image

fields.name: opacity
fields.label: Image Opacity
fields.description: Tip: if your text is difficult to read, try setting the background color to black, the image opacity to 75%, and the text to a light color.

fields.name: pubDate
fields.label: Publish Date
fields.description: The date this post was originally created.

fields.name: editDate
fields.label: Edit Date
fields.description: The date this post was updated (if edited after the publish date).

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
